laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: After PTU treatment: FT3 reduced to 3.1 pmol/liter and slightly high at 6.6 pmol/liter with LT4.

laboratory_examinations.findings: 1.54 mU/liter (normal range 0.4–3.6 mU/liter) - normal initially, elevated to 50.1 mU/liter after PTU, then normalized to 3.18 mU/liter after LT4 treatment.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: High TSH levels developed after PTU treatment and were normalized after adding LT4.

laboratory_examinations.findings: 261 nmol/liter (normal range 15–45 nmol/liter) - elevated initially, reduced to 72 nmol/liter after PTU and further reduced to 102 nmol/liter after LT4.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Decreased from 261 nmol/liter to 72 nmol/liter after PTU treatment.

laboratory_examinations.findings: 14.5 pmol/liter initially, then undetectable after PTU treatment, normal at 16.4 pmol/liter after LT4 treatment.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: FT4 was undetectable after PTU and returned to normal after LT4 treatment.

laboratory_examinations.findings: 11.4 ng/ml increased to 874 ng/ml after PTU treatment.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Increased significantly from 11.4 ng/ml to 874 ng/ml after 12 and 24 weeks of PTU treatment.

laboratory_examinations.findings: 881 kcal (predicted 931 kcal) at baseline and increased to 1160 kcal after PTU and 1207 kcal after PTU plus LT4.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Increased from 881 kcal to 1160 kcal after PTU and to 1207 kcal after LT4 treatment.
